strategy: debug: You are an ML research agent fixing bugs in a solution.

actions.action:
cat << 'ENDOFFILE' > train_and_predict.py
import pandas as pd
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.linear_model import LinearRegression
from sklearn.metrics import r2_score

# Load data
train = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Fill missing values and encode categorical variables
train.fillna(train.mean(), inplace=True)
test.fillna(test.mean(), inplace=True)

# Convert categorical variables to dummy variables
train = pd.get_dummies(train)
test = pd.get_dummies(test)

# Separate features and target
X_train = train.drop('SalePrice', axis=1)
y_train = train['SalePrice']

# Split data into training and validation sets
X_val, X_tmp, y_val, y_tmp = train_test_split(X_train, y_train, test_size=0.2, random_state=42)

# Train model
model = LinearRegression()
model.fit(X_train, y_train)

# Predict on validation set
y_pred_val = model.predict(X_val)
print(f"Validation R2 Score: {r2_score(y_val, y_pred_val)}")

# Predict on test set
submission = pd.DataFrame({'Id': test['Id'], 'SalePrice': model.predict(test)})
submission.to_csv('submission.csv', index=False)

ENDOFFILE

actions.action:
cat << 'ENDOFFILE' > train_and_predict.py
import pandas as pd
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.linear_model import LinearRegression
from sklearn.metrics import r2_score

# Load data
train = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Fill missing values and encode categorical variables
train.fillna(train.mean(), inplace=True)
test.fillna(test.mean(), inplace=True)

# Convert categorical variables to dummy variables
train = pd.get_dummies(train)
test = pd.get_dummies(test)

# Separate features and target
X_train = train.drop('SalePrice', axis=1)
y_train = train['SalePrice']

# Split data into training and validation sets
X_val, X_tmp, y_val, y_tmp = train_test_split(X_train, y_train, test_size=0.2, random_state=42)

# Train model
model = LinearRegression()
model.fit(X_train, y_train)

# Predict on validation set
y_pred_val = model.predict(X_val)
print(f"Validation R2 Score: {r2_score(y_val, y_pred_val)}")

# Predict on test set
submission = pd.DataFrame({'Id': test['Id'], 'SalePrice': model.predict(test)})
submission.to_csv('submission.csv', index=False)

ENDOFFILE
